name: Children of Echoes
desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Nanatzcayan. The tribe's people are famous for mining and live alongside the Tepetlisaurs.

imgDesc.text: The settlement of the tribe who live alongside the Tepetlisaurs, known as the "Children of Echoes." Whether it's the clanging of artisans' hammers or the tapping of gem hunters testing the rocks, echoing sounds can be heard throughout the canyon.

customize.text: Notable Members

Ixquieh
Ahpub's twin sister and a former chief. She fought alongside the first Pyro Archon,

customize.name: Xbalanque
customize.desc: The first Pyro Archon, who defeated the Flamelord and revived from the flames.

customize.text: , and later defended the Saurians from her brother and

customize.name: Och-Kan
customize.desc: A dragon mixed with a human soul, the ruler of the Cinder City, known as the Python King and Sacred Lord.

customize.text:
's orders. She was killed by her brother.
Sakkuk
A peacemaker and one of the six heroes who defeated the ruler of the Cinder City.

customize.name: Sundjatta
customize.desc: Chief of the Children of Echoes and one of the six heroes of Natlan with the Ancient NameHe died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.text: A former chief who went with Tenoch to the future Mare Jivari during the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text:
500 years ago. His companion was a Stegosaurus Muhuru.
Traore
Legendary Elder of the Children of Echoes who fought along with the warriors from
during the Cataclysm 500 years ago. According to a legend, Traore defeated the Volcano Lord with the Shadow Pins.
Tribal chief

customize.name: Xilonen
customize.desc: A Name Engraver of the Nanatzcayan, she is especially skilled at finding a good balance between the heavy responsibilities of her job and living well.

customize.text: The most famous engraver of the tribe, who can forge an Ancient Name. She is a hero of the Children of Echoes, who has been acknowledged by her Ancient Name

customize.name: Kachina
customize.desc: A young warrior of the Nanatzcayan, given the Ancient Name of "Uthabiti." Kind-hearted and insatiably persistent, she grows stronger and more capable with each setback she faces.

customize.text: Natlanese hero, who has won in the Night Warden Wars. Her Ancient Name is

customize.name: Titu
customize.desc: Storyteller of the Children of Echoes and a guard at the sentry post. The real Titu lived about 500 years ago, and then his image was used by Waxaklahun Ubah Kan.

customize.text: Tribal storyteller. Presumably, he went to about 490 years ago, and now his "mask" is used by .

customize.name: Manqu
customize.desc: A researcher for the Saurian Relics Association, who is responsible for scholarly inquiries into certain tribal customs. The real Manqu was a craftsman who lived a thousand years ago and died during the overthrow of the tyrant Och-Kan. Now, Manqu is a phlogiston projection of Waxaklahun Ubah Kan.

customize.text: Researcher for the Saurian Relics Association, responsible for scholarly inquiries into certain tribal customs. He lived about 1,000 years ago, and now his "mask" is used by .
Area

customize.name: Tequemecan Valley
customize.desc: The settlement of the tribe who live alongside the Tepetlisaurs, known as the "Children of Echoes." Whether it's the clanging of artisans' hammers or the tapping of gem hunters testing the rocks, echoing sounds can be heard throughout the canyon.

customize.text: Relationships

customize.name: Tepetlisaurus
customize.desc:
A Saurian with a drill-like horn and strong claws that can tunnel through rocks and solid phlogiston.
According to legend, the ancestor of all Tepetlisaurs was a massive drake as large as a mountain, with an exceptionally long lifespan. When it slept, mountains would form along its back, and when it woke, it would shake off the dirt and rocks, leaving behind gems and jade shining amongst its scales. The huge, drill-shaped objects in the Children of Echoes are said to be the remains of that great drake's large drill-horn.

customize.name: Tepetlisaur Whelp
customize.desc:
A young Tepetlisaurus with the ability to tunnel between rocks and solid phlogiston.
They have not yet formed the horns on their forehead, and their digging skills are still developing as well. It is even common to hear about young Tepetlisaurs getting trapped by rocks while practicing their digging. However, one day, they will grow into a form that may travel freely through even the toughest of soils.

customize.text: Tribal companions
Related Books and Items

customize.name: Ring of Yaxche
customize.desc: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.

customize.name: Talking Stick
customize.desc: Most people will find this obsidian-inlaid club quite convincing indeed.

customize.name: Peak Patrol Song
customize.desc: An obsidian blade of unparalleled sharpness, light as a song. It was modified by a certain artisan to come equipped with a record-playing detachable Phlogiston Device.

customize.name: Mountain-Bracing Bolt
customize.desc: This polearm was once jointly forged by the craftsmen in the mines as a sacrifice to the spirits of the mountains.

customize.name: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City
The Volcano Lord and the Shadow Pins
Yellow Obsidian Ring
customize.desc: An obsidian ring with engraved patterns styled like those of the Children of Echoes. It is an ancient medium by which the tribe established contact with the deep night. Perhaps its strength can allow you to cross the boundary between this place and a certain other location...

customize.name: "Children of Echoes" Reputation EXP
customize.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (Children of Echoes)

customize.name: Glittering Gemstones
customize.desc: Multicolored biscuits. First, use dough to create a gemstone fitting, before adding jam of different colors and flavors to the setting. The result resembles nothing so much as an exquisite gemstone pendant, but be careful not to mix them up with the real thing!

You'll run into all kinds of Saurians during your adventures here in Natlan.

Illustrations
"Children of Echoes"

<color=#ffd780>August 17, 2024</color>
Hello, Traveler!
Today, we'll be introducing the "Children of Echoes," one of Natlan's six tribes. Word has it that the mines near the tribes hide a lot of treasure!
